description: Determines whether the specified path points to a directory

8bebea78-fb92-4cab-8af9-a090c3fc7f3a.description:
Receives the path to test whether it is a directory or not.

Example:
"/home/user1/dir1"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
8bebea78-fb92-4cab-8af9-a090c3fc7f3a.name: path

121d6f2f-caf0-40e3-926c-4f33ad1c2026.description:
Sends boolean value that indicates whether the specified path is a directory.

Example:
true
121d6f2f-caf0-40e3-926c-4f33ad1c2026.name: is directory

name: io/file/Directory tester
